short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bulk-download all photos from Albums or a single Facebook photo's collection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Note: this extension is not officially developed by Facebook, The author is @ChangJoo Park.

Got feedback or experiencing any issues? Let us know on Facebook! Your input is important to us and we're here to help.
https://www.facebook.com/fbesuit

Download all Facebook photos from Albums.
This extension allows you to bulk-download all photos from Albums or a single Facebook collection.

This extension uses Facebook addresses to function, so it needs to be able to read your browser data on Facebook addresses

Works on:
- Any User's Album
- Any Page's Album
- Any Photo Collection
- Any photo viewer

With ‚ù§Ô∏è from fbesuit.com

Instagram version
 https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/download-albums-for-insta/inkncgklbglecgdlcpfpajejocdpbpbd

You know, it‚Äôs easy to save a single photo on Facebook. Just hover over the image, right-click or tap on the image and select ‚ÄúSave Image As‚Ä¶‚Äù, pretty simple, huh?
What if you have a thousand pictures to download? I bet you don‚Äôt want to save them one by one.

Imagine, with only a few clicks, you get a copy of all your favorite pictures. Even better, you‚Äôll get the exact albums/photos you want without sacrificing image quality.

You could then keep those digital memories in a safe place, or share them with family members offline. For those who want to close their Facebook account, you can do so without worrying about data loss.

Or download all photos of your crush, everything done in a few clicks.

Install this extension and make that works for you.

long.en,en_AU:
#How to Download Facebook Photos in bulk? #How to Save Pictures from Facebook?

Before you delete all the photos from Facebook and lose them forever, downloading them first might be a great idea. That way, they will all be in the same folder.
This extension allows you to bulk-download all photos from Albums or a single Facebook collection.

Works on:
- Any User's Album
- Any Page's Album
- Any Photo Collection
- Any photo viewer

With ‚ù§Ô∏è from esuit.dev

Instagram version
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/esuit-photosdownloader-fo/adighedbfmnpjcjlloooichmbjdefane

You know, it‚Äôs easy to save a single photo on Facebook. Just hover over the image, right-click or tap on the image and select ‚ÄúSave Image As‚Ä¶‚Äù, pretty simple, huh?
What if you have a thousand pictures to download? I bet you don‚Äôt want to save them one by one.

Imagine, with only a few clicks, you get a copy of all your favorite pictures. Even better, you‚Äôll get the exact albums/photos you want without sacrificing image quality.

You could then keep those digital memories in a safe place, or share them with family members offline. For those who want to close their Facebook account, you can do so without worrying about data loss.

Or download all photos of your crush, everything done in a few clicks.

Install this extension and make that works for you.

Changelogs:
In version 3.0.0, we completely rewrote the extension, and here are the modifications:
- New feature: Resume downloading - now you can continue downloading from where you left off, instead of starting from the beginning every time the download is interrupted.
- New feature: Individual image download - you can now conveniently download single images within the image viewer.
- New feature: Account restriction prevention - added a timer algorithm that introduces delays between requests to avoid imposing limits on your account due to excessive requests (please note that this might significantly decrease the download progress, but you can disable this feature by enabling FullSpeed mode).
- New feature: Compatibility mode - this mode disables animations in the extension to address performance issues for some users.
- Optimization: Memory usage optimization - we have implemented new techniques to optimize memory usage, allowing for the downloading of images larger than 10k.
- Optimization: Improved UI interaction - streamlined and expedited the download process for a more user-friendly experience.
- Bug fix: Fixed the non-functioning "saveIndex" feature when "genFolder" is enabled.
- Bug fix: Corrected the issue where the download feature was erroneously displayed in the video section.

If you need to subscribe to our service, we will collect your email address to verify your subscription status. (We only collect this data from subscribers; if you do not subscribe, we will not collect any of your data.) This is our privacy policy.
https://esuit.dev/privacy-policy

Notice: this extension has In-App Purchases.
This extension includes features that require payment to unlock unlimited usage. Please refer to our pricing page for more details.
https://esuit.dev/pricing/download-albums-for-facebook

Additional Features:
In the Popup, we provide the following additional features:

Function Description: A brief description accompanied by a video tutorial demonstrating how to use this extension.
Login Button: Use when you need to subscribe to premium features or log in with an existing subscription.
Relevant-Ext: We provide brief recommendations and introductions to relevant extensions in a small section.

How to Save Pictures from Facebook?
